SELECT ROWNUM RN, T1.* FROM ( SELECT A.LIC_GRP_ID , A.LOGIN_HIS_ID , A.LOGIN_USR_ID , TO_CHAR(A.LOGIN_TIME,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as LOGIN_TIME /* 로그인 일시 */ , TO_CHAR(A.LOGOUT_TIME,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as LOGOUT_TIME /* 로그아웃 일시 */ , A.LOGIN_IP , B.USR_NM , B.USR_IMG_ID , A.LOGIN_STATUS , SF_STM4001_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'CMM00006', A.LOGIN_STATUS, '1') AS LOGIN_STATUS_NM FROM STM5000 A INNER JOIN STM3000 B ON ( A.LOGIN_USR_ID = B.USR_ID AND A.LIC_GRP_ID = B.LIC_GRP_ID ) WHERE 1=1 AND A.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId#
ORDER BY $paramSortFieldId$
DESC
ORDER BY A.LOGIN_TIME DESC
) T1 WHERE 1=1
AND T1.USR_NM LIKE '%'||#searchTargetData#||'%'
AND T1.LOGIN_IP LIKE '%'||#searchTargetData#||'%'
AND T1.LOGIN_USR_ID LIKE '%'||#searchTargetData#||'%'
AND T1.LOGIN_STATUS = #searchTargetData#
AND T1.LOGIN_TIME >= TO_DATE(#searchStartDt#, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
AND T1.LOGIN_TIME <= TO_DATE(#searchEndDt#, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
AND T1.LOGOUT_TIME >= TO_DATE(#searchStartDt#, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
AND T1.LOGOUT_TIME <= TO_DATE(#searchEndDt#, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')

sqlMap.insert:
SELECT NVL( SUBSTR(NEW_LOGIN_HIS_ID, 1, 11) || LPAD( (TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(NEW_LOGIN_HIS_ID, 12, 5)) + 1) , 5, '0') , 'LGN' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') || '00001' ) AS NEW_REQ_ID FROM ( SELECT MAX(LOGIN_HIS_ID) AS NEW_LOGIN_HIS_ID FROM STM5000 A WHERE 1=1 AND A.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND A.LOGIN_HIS_ID LIKE 'LGN' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') || '%' )
INSERT INTO STM5000 ( LIC_GRP_ID, LOGIN_HIS_ID, LOGIN_USR_ID, LOGIN_TIME, LOGOUT_TIME, LOGIN_IP, LOGIN_STATUS ) VALUES ( #licGrpId#, #newLoginHisId#, #loginUsrId#, SYSDATE, NULL, #loginIp#, #loginStatus# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE STM5000 A SET A.LOGOUT_TIME = SYSDATE WHERE 1=1 AND A.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND A.LOGIN_USR_ID = #loginUsrId# AND A.LOGOUT_TIME IS NULL AND A.LOGIN_TIME = ( SELECT MAX(LOGIN_TIME) FROM STM5000 WHERE 1=1 AND LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND LOGIN_USR_ID = #loginUsrId# AND LOGOUT_TIME IS NULL )
sqlMap.select: SELECT NVL(TO_CHAR(MAX(T1.LOGIN_TIME),'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') )as LOGIN_TIME FROM STM5000 T1, STM3000 T2 WHERE T1.LOGIN_USR_ID = T2.USR_ID AND T1.LIC_GRP_ID = T2.LIC_GRP_ID AND T1.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND T1.LOGIN_USR_ID = #usrId#

SELECT MAX(T.REC_LOGIN_TIME) AS LOGIN_TIME FROM ( SELECT TO_CHAR(LEAD(T1.LOGIN_TIME) OVER(ORDER BY T1.LOGIN_TIME DESC ),'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS REC_LOGIN_TIME FROM STM5000 T1, STM3000 T2 WHERE T1.LOGIN_USR_ID = T2.USR_ID AND T1.LIC_GRP_ID = T2.LIC_GRP_ID AND T1.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND T1.LOGIN_USR_ID = #usrId# ) T
